attributes.action: Make the GCSEs and A-Levels in 2021 open book exams.
attributes.additional_details: the year 10s and 12s also had a negative impact on their education and missed out on so much important information.
attributes.background: during the COVID-19 pandemic year 10s and year 12s have missed out on a lot of content. the 2020 GCSEs and A-Levels got cancelled, and it would be completely unfair to expect the year 10s and 12s to do the normal GCSEs when their education has also been negatively impacted.
